ModMetaData.name: 1trickPwnyta's Defaults
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to set various defaults to use during gameplay, such as the default schedules your colonists will assume.
Full list of settings: - Schedules: Allows you to set custom default schedules for colonists. You can create alternating schedules and the mod will cycle between them when assigning them to new colonists.
